summary: The agent report is generally accurate but lacks some specific metrics and details on the causal chain. Actionability is limited due to the absence of recommendations.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as the root cause but did not explicitly mention 拉檔 (frequency throttling).

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is partially captured, but the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms are not mentioned.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the VCORE 29.32% usage but missed other specific metrics like DDR percentages and CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or recommendations are provided, limiting actionability.
